words.to_user_wppg: Directions on how to access WhatsApp Launch Manager on your computer:
words.3: 3. Point your phone to this screen to capture the code
words.make_sure: 1. Please make sure to not have another session logged into WhatsApp.
words.in_order: 2. In order for your campaigns to run correctly, you must be logged in to Builderall Launch Manager
words.error_image_size: A imagem selecionada deve ter menos de 12mb
words.tag_required: O nome das tags não podem conter: Letras Maiúsculas - Espaço
words.delete_number_question: Are you sure about deleting this number?
words.cant_delete: you cannot delete this number because it is connected to a campaign!
words.number_registered: This number has already been registered
words.different_number: You are trying to authenticate a different number from the registered one!
words.alert_disconnected: Looks like this number is not connected!
words.inform_1: To use all WhatsApp Launch Manager features, you cannot have other active connections (like Builderall Zap, WhatsApp Web, etc)!
words.inform_2: Campaigns with disconnected number will not create groups and will not send messages, please reconnect this number and try again.
words.important: If you disconnect your phone to use another WhatsApp application, this campaign will be stopped, messages will not be sent and leads will not be able to join groups.
words.wpp_beta: We do not support the Beta version of WhatsApp as it is still in development
words.delete_campaign: Do you really want delete this campaign? This action cannot be undone.
words.delete_cp2: By deleting this campaign, you will delete all history of member joins, sent messages and all information about that campaign.
words.unavailable_group: It looks like this group is no longer available!
words.not_adm: you are not admin of this group
words.delete_group: Do you really want to delete this group? This action cannot be undone.
words.delete_gp2: Once you delete this group, you will no longer be able to manage it by that campaign.
words.archive_question: When archiving this campaign, it will be listed at Archived 'tab
words.unarchive_question: When you unarchive this campaign, it will be listed at Active 'tab
words.campaign_archived_error: It looks like this campaign is no longer available.
words.android: For better functioning, we recommend using devices with Android operating system

words.auto_att_tooltip:
Auto attendance: The customer chooses the sector they want to chat with. 
 Default sector: All new attendance will be directed to the default sector

words.unavailable_msg_tooltip: This message is shown when there are no online operators
words.initial_msg_tooltip: This message is shown after the customer selects the sector they want to talk to
